The 26” was not in stock on their website, but customer service made it available for me to purchase and gifted me a bang accessory to compensate for the extra manufactoring time.

I placed my order on March 4th 2025 and the shipment was sent on March 12th. It arrived exactly one week later. I’m in the EU, so I had to pay customs VAT of 40 USD. Because this was my first purchase, I used the welcome discount code and got 40 USD off my purchase. I also ordered during Women’s Day, so I got a wig Starter Kit added to my order as well.

Be aware you can’t apply more than one discount code. That means that if you have redeemed a free gift, you won’t be able to get it with the same order.

When the wig arrived, I was absolutely enamored with the feel and the smell of the hair. The feel of human hair is so much different from the cheap, synthetic wigs I have from Amazon, there’s really no comparison. The unboxing was a treat in itself and the accessories were a nice added bonus. The wig was beautifully preplucked and the knots bleached. The length of the wig was actually much longer than 26”, more like 30 or 32 inches! I specifically wanted a very long wig, so this was a great surprise. It also passed the burn test and acted like human hair.

I have a small and pretty flat back of my head, so the wig is actually too big, but the Small would be too tight. You can fix this yourself by sewing the tracks in the wig cap closer together to make it lay more flat against the scalp. YouTube has a lot of great videos. I ended up making my own “hair pad” from a wig cap and some synthetic hair which I put inside of the wig before wearing it. You can also get a custom size if you prefer. Importantly, you always have the option to return the wig, just make sure to not cut the lace or the tags off.

I’ve had the wig for 1 month now. I don’t wear it daily only on occasion and I’ve washed, conditioned and used a flat iron and the wig still looks great, but will of course need proper care. I’d recommend Lab Muffin Beauty Science for scientific and evidence-based tips about hair care. The wig has been shedding a lot less than my synthetic wigs. It still looks really great. I've left the same review on the Hairvivi website including a few pictures. The first photo is from the day of arrival and the last picture is one month after with the bangs attached but otherwise minimal styling.

All in all I’m very satisfied and happy with my purchase and I expect the wig to last for many years. I've learned a lot from this whole experience. Hairvivi’s products and customer service are great and I’ll definitely be using them again in the future.
